A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat (Ginga) stopping anyone going near the family. Simon (Michael Sarrazin) lives next door, and he despises cats and loves guns. A TV series is based on the events.
